Header: One Arrested With Heroin In Mt. Lavinia
Content: Mount Lavinia Anti-Vice squad arrested an individual who had 5 g and 380 mg of heroin in possession during a raid conducted in Badovita area yesterday (01), Police Media Unit Told Hiru news. The suspect in custody is a 34-year-old resident of Mount Lavinia area. He will be produced before Mount Lavinia Magistrate today and Police are conducting further investigations into the matter.
